name: Zehitomo Co., Ltd.
description: Operator of an online matching platform intended to match people with highly specialized professionals. The company's platform offers a space where users can connect with experts from various fields such as photography, online lessons, and many more, and receive the required service, enabling local professionals to grow their businesses and increase profitability through volume.
